transactions.description: Stores financial transaction records for users. Each row represents a single transaction (expense or income) with timestamps, category linkage, amount, description and type. Useful for building ledgers, summaries and reports per user and per category.

categories.description: Defines user-specific categories for transactions (for example: groceries, salary, utilities). Categories help classify transactions and are linked to users so each user can have a custom set.

user_settings.description: Holds per-user preferences and settings such as default currency. Each record maps to a single user and stores lightweight configuration values used by the app.

month_history.description: Aggregated monthly history for a user. Each entry represents summarized values for a particular day/month/year combination (often used for charts and quick lookups). Typically used to display trends and monthly rollups.

year_history.description: Yearly history summary per user. Each record aggregates income and expense for a given month and year or provides yearly rollups useful for annual reports and comparisons.
